name: Sticky Memory
description:
Sticky Memory is a puzzle game created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare #45 (theme: You start with nothing). It is a game somewhat inspired by Memory, but quite different, and where the cards stick to each other to make bigger cards. The goal is to make one big card out of all of them.

As you may notice, this is definitely not a finished game, but at least the main mechanics is there.
